specialty.description:
{Tarmans and Saints  Tarmans}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Tarmans and Saints  Tarmans for each level attained after 7rd level. Additionally, Tarmans and Saints  Tarmans get a permanent +1 Speed bonus.
